title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
Description: If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When attempting to add a localization key with a blank value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The system should display the externalized text in the chart even if the localization key is blank.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Attempt to add a localization key with a blank value.
